mapper.select: select tt.name as tenantName , count(case when tewn.type=1000 then tewn.type end ) hardwareWarnMsgCount, count(case when tewn.type=101 then tewn.type end ) systemWarnMsgCount from t_ele_warn_msg tewn left join t_tenant tt on tewn.tenant_id=tt.id group by tt.name limit #{query.offset}, #{query.size}
